SEARCH
Module org.microbean.bean
Package org.microbean.bean

Class Assignability

java.lang.Object
org.microbean.bean.Assignability
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constable
public final class Assignability extends Object implements Constable
A class encapsulating CDI-compatible assignability ("matching") rules as applied to TypeMirrors.
Author:
Laird Nelson
See Also:
  • matches(TypeMirror, TypeMirror)

      public Assignability(TypeAndElementSource tes)

  • Method Details

    • describeConstable

      public final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable()
      Specified by:
      describeConstable in interface Constable

    • oneMatches

      public final boolean oneMatches(TypeMirror receiver, Iterable<? extends TypeMirror> payloads)
      Returns true if and only if at least one TypeMirror present in the supplied payloads argument matches the supplied receiver argument.
      Parameters:
      receiver - the left hand side of a type assignment; must not be null
      payloads - an Iterable of TypeMirrors each representing a potential right hand side of a type assignment; must not be null
      Returns:
      true if and only if at least one TypeMirror present in the supplied payloads argument matches the supplied receiver argument; false otherwise
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if either argument is null
      See Also:
      • matches(TypeMirror, TypeMirror)

    • matches

      public final boolean matches(TypeMirror receiver, TypeMirror payload)
      Returns true if and only if the supplied payload argument matches the supplied receiver argument, according to the rules defined by section 2.4.2.1 of the CDI specification.
      Parameters:
      receiver - the left hand side of a type assignment; must not be null
      payload - the right hand side of a type assignment; must not be null
      Returns:
      true if and only if the supplied payload argument matches the supplied receiver argument, according to the rules defined by section 2.4.2.1 of the CDI specification; false otherwise
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if either argument is null

    • typeAndElementSource

      public final TypeAndElementSource typeAndElementSource()
      Returns the TypeAndElementSource used by this Assignability.
      Returns:
      the TypeAndElementSource used by this Assignability; never null
      See Also:
      • Assignability(TypeAndElementSource)
      • TypeAndElementSource
